text: Khoo Chin-bee (born 4 May 1977, in Perak) is a former Malaysian female tennis player. Khoo has won one singles and nine doubles titles on the ITF circuit in her career. On 15 September 2003, she reached her best singles ranking of world number 329. On 17 August 1998, she peaked at world number 209 in the doubles rankings. Playing for Malaysia at the Fed Cup, Khoo has a win-loss record of 25-17.
